title: NxN 2048 Game
desc: This is a quick project, and I had lots of fun with it. I figured the array sliding algorithm would be a fun challenge to kill my boredom.

title: Robotic Guitar Player
desc: It is making a machine that plays the guitar. It is comprised of a Rasberry Pi, STM32, 6 ESPs, 6 servos, and 6 steppers. To debug and setup the system I've developed a WebApp. Made with Flask and ReactJS.

title: K Nearest Neighbour Analyzer
desc: Framework to visualize, test, and predict a k Nearest Nighbours model. Built a UI to load feature vectors and labels. Optionally can create a brand new feature vector, and load labels.
